item.title: Foobar sorting
item.description:
Since some time Iâ€™ve been sorting my music collection. Going though my hard-drives and Cdâ€™s finding all music-files and moving them to a common place and with the help of foobar2000 place them in a sane directory-structure and keep them there.

Within foobar I sort the artists on the following script. This makes sure that The (International) Noise Conspiracy is among the other artist that begins with I.

$replace($replace($replace($stripprefix(%artist%),â€™|â€™,),'[â€˜,),'(â€˜,)

That little script keeps things nice and tidy within foobar, but to sort I use these two massive scripts:
